sourcesContent:
Esta factura se asimila en todos sus efectos a una letra de cambio de conformidad con el Art. 774 del código de comercio. Autorizo que en caso de incumplimiento de esta obligación sea reportado a las centrales de riesgo, se cobrarán intereses por mora.

LS-DA SAS es una empresa acogida al Régimen Simple de Tributación - RST, no estamos sujetos a retenciones a título de Renta ni de ICA, por favor no practicar retenciones en la fuente ni de ica.

Autorización de numeración de facturación N°18764042773838 de 2023-01-13 Modalidad Factura Electrónica Desde N° LSDA1 hasta LSDA10000 con vigencia hasta 2024-01-13

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Item } from '../../models/item.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-factura-venta-nuevo', templateUrl: './factura-venta-nuevo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./factura-venta-nuevo.component.css'] }) export class FacturaVentaNuevoComponent { items: Item[] = []; // Create an array to hold the items selectedItem: Item; // Create a property to hold the selected item total: number = 0; // Initialize the total to 0 constructor() { this.addRow(); // Create the three items and add them to the items array this.items.push({ itemName: 'Activacion NIT', reference: 'Reference 1', price: 100, tax: 10, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); this.items.push({ itemName: 'Volumen Documento Electronico', reference: 'Reference 2', price: 200, tax: 10, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); this.items.push({ itemName: 'TEPRE', reference: 'Reference 3', price: 300, tax: 10, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); // Set the default selected item to the first item in the array this.selectedItem = this.items[0]; // Calculate the initial total this.calculateTotal(); } addRow(): void { // Add a new row with default values only if the items array is empty if (this.items.length === 0) { this.items.push({ itemName: '', // Set the default value to an empty string reference: '', price: 0, tax: 0, discount: 0, charge: 0, }); } // Recalculate the total this.calculateTotal(); } deleteRow(index: number): void { // Delete the row at the specified index this.items.splice(index, 1); // Recalculate the total this.calculateTotal(); } // Calculate the total value from price and tax of all rows calculateTotal(): void { this.total = this.items.reduce((sum, row) => { const price = row.price || 0; const tax = row.tax || 0; return sum + price + (price * tax) / 100; }, 0); } // Handle the event when the "Item" dropdown selection changes onItemChange(rowIndex: number): void { // Logic to set the values for "Referencia" and "Precio Unitario" based on the selected item const selectedItem = this.items[rowIndex].itemName; // Find the corresponding item in the items array const matchedItem = this.items.find((item) => item.itemName === selectedItem); if (matchedItem) { // Update the row values with the matched item values this.items[rowIndex].reference = matchedItem.reference; this.items[rowIndex].price = matchedItem.price; this.items[rowIndex].tax = matchedItem.tax; this.items[rowIndex].discount = matchedItem.discount; this.items[rowIndex].charge = matchedItem.charge; } // Recalculate the total after updating the values this.calculateTotal(); } }
